name: maude
description: A desktop AI assistant powered by Claude

scripts.build:desktop: bun run --filter @maude/client build && bun run --filter @maude/server build:binary && bun run suffix-binary
scripts.start: bun run --filter @maude/client build && bun run --filter @maude/server start
scripts.test:coverage: bun run --filter @maude/server test:coverage && bun run --filter @maude/shared test:coverage && bun run --filter @maude/client test:coverage
